data.text: @DanielleStarry @hannah_animal Fair enough ^-^ I only I commented on it because they said about pugs and respiration issues. So yeah, two things that weren’t her fault 🤦🏻‍♀️
@hannah_animal She even gets shit for breathing which is very sad 😢
@DanielleStarry So you’re saying she doesn’t have to do anything to get better and look better?

@Crump6Jayden Tbh you’re not looking out for her at all. She’s severely mentally ill to the point that it’s outwardly visible. She doesn’t owe anyone her mental or physical health. She’s doing her best every day.

@prettycringey @hannah_animal Her family got the dog when she was young. She had no hand in how he came to be in her home. As far as breeding goes, none of it was on her. She just loves her sweet boy.
@hannah_animal “Don’t care for or feed your pets if you have Covid” is effectively what they said. What a goofball.

@hannah_animal People find every detail to nitpick and shit on her for. She doesn’t owe us anything. She’s just doing her best every day. Eating disorders aren’t fucking contagious, lord! She’s just a mentally ill chick who likes fashion.
